title: Improvement of pulmonary function parameters in female patients with adolescent idiopathic scoliosis by Schroth rehabilitative therapy
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Kyra Stein, Fabian Holzgreve, Fee Keil, Panagiotis Diaremes, David A. Groneberg, Eileen M. Wanke, Omar Zabar, Daniela Ohlendorf
